org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client

Class GroupsRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.RestClient<GroupsApi>
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client.GroupsRestClient

  • public class GroupsRestClient
extends RestClient<GroupsApi>
    Class used to make requests to the groups API.
